Synopsis: Get-MimeType function returns the MIME type of a file based on its extension.
Description: This function takes a file name as input and returns the corresponding MIME type based on the file extension.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-MimeType -FileName "example.jpg"
Returns "image/jpeg" as the MIME type for the file "example.jpg".

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-MimeType -FileName "example.png"
Returns "image/png" as the MIME type for the file "example.png".
